title: Trump's 'smoke and mirror' cuts will hit swing state even harder than expected: study
description: President Donald Trump’s signature law of his second term provides vastly more benefits to the rich Ohioans than to any other group, and it also takes more away from Ohio’s most vulnerable families than most people might realize, a new analysis says.This summ…
